definition: forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)

sentences.english: I is a traditional Chinese girl with the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我是个具有传统婚姻观的中国女孩。

sentences.english: I remarried and now am with someone who loves me-- but what marriage doesn't hold problems of its own.
sentences.chinese: 我和一个爱我的人再婚了，但是婚姻仍然存在着问题。

sentences.english: It would have been Hefner's third marriage.
sentences.chinese: 这原本将是赫夫纳的第三次婚姻。

sentences.english: Seeing their children get married will always be their top concern.
sentences.chinese: 儿女的婚姻大事，永远都是他们最关心的事情。

sentences.english: In fact, nothing teaches you sanctification like the life of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，没有什么比持续一生的婚姻更神圣的。

sentences.english: That's certainly the prevailing view of marriage, American style, in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 这确实是2009年当下最普遍的美国式婚姻观。

sentences.english: In my eyes it would be no marriage at all, but that would be nothing.
sentences.chinese: 在我后来，这根本算不上婚姻，不过这也无关紧要。

sentences.english: But it was also a bold attack on feudalism and arranged marriage.
sentences.chinese: 但它同时也是对封建制度和包办婚姻的一记猛击。

sentences.english: But marriage of 8 years lets her have affliction talk however.
sentences.chinese: 但是8年的婚姻却让她有苦难言。

sentences.english: Marriage without registration is not recognized by law.
sentences.chinese: 法律不承认未登记的婚姻。

sentences.english: Love is blind but marriage is an eye-opener.
sentences.chinese: 爱情让人盲目，而婚姻则让人重获光明。

sentences.english: Some people's fear of marriage can be traced back to their parents' divorce. ;
sentences.chinese: 一些人对婚姻的惊骇可以追溯到他们怙恃的仳离。

sentences.english: The church would not sanction his second marriage.
sentences.chinese: 教会不会认可他的第二次婚姻。

sentences.english: To Marc Chagall, the marriage with Bella Rosenfeld, his life, bears the best witness to love and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 与妻子蓓拉的婚姻，是夏卡尔感受爱与美最好的见证。

sentences.english: So the king ordered that the marriage of the shepherd and the princess take place without delay.
sentences.chinese: 于是王下令，该牧羊人和公主的婚姻采取不拖延。

sentences.english: She fled to her parents’ house to escape an abusive marriage.
sentences.chinese: 为了逃避屈辱的婚姻，她逃到父母家。

definition: emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to get married soon after meeting (abbr. for 閃電結婚|闪电结婚[shan3 dian4 jie2 hun1]) (neologism c. 2005)
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
